VideoTitle: Developing Games with Construct 2: (03) Exploring Construct 2 Templates
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Learn to leverage existing Construct 2 templates to build and customize your own version of Flappy Bird, an infinite jumper/runner, and a trivia game. [04:23] - Inspecting/Modifying a Template[13:46]
